posts.post_title: **SOLD**  1926-29 Exhibits JIMMIE FOXX  HOF Rookie RC  SGC 1.5 **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
SOLD

1926-29 Exhibits JIMMIE FOXX HOF Rookie  SGC 1.5

PAST SALES - PSA 5 sold for $31,200 / PSA 2 sold for $5,100 in 2022

RARER THAN GEHRIG ROOKIE:  There are 73 Jimmie Foxx rookie cards (1926-29 Exhibits) graded between SGC & PSA vs. a total of 92 Lou Gehrig rookie cards (1925 Exhibits) graded by the same two companies  

The image of the card shown is used on the "Old Cardboard" HOF rookie website
